title: Surface Laptop Studio gets new Voice Clarity feature with firmware update
content:
Microsoft is rolling out a set of new firmware and driver updates for the Surface Laptop Studio, adding support for a new feature called Voice Clarity. As you might have guessed from the name, this is a feature designed to help users be heard more clearly during calls and meetings. The feature is exclusively available

description: Microsoft is rolling out a new set of updates for the Surface Laptop Studio, adding a brand-new Voice Clarity feature and other improvements.
